name: Soraya Belghazi
membership: member of the International Chamber of Commerce (ICC) Belgium
memberOrga:
The list of ICAS members is available at:
https://icas.global/about/members/
goal: I work as a freelance consultant for the international Council for Advertising Self-Regulation (ICAS), a global platform promoting responsible ads through the effective implementation of self-regulatory standards.
interests: Communication, Consumers, Culture, Culture and media, Digital economy and society
euInitiatives:
I follow media policy, issues around new technologies and the information society, legislation around data protection, competition issues in the advertising sector, etc.

Among the EU legislative initiatives of interest are:
- GDPR
- ePrivacy
- AVMSD
